modName: DragonBorn Craftables and Temperables With Hrothmunds Axe
summary:
Allows you to make and upgrade the following, all unenchanted.
3.4 Adds 54 Items to the Games Craft Menu From DragonBorn.
Telvani Robes 
Temple Priest Robes
Hrothmund\'s Axe!!! 
Miraak Staff (A little weaker)
Carius\' Armor
Miraak armor, glove, Boot, Mask
Falx Armor, Glove, Boots, Helmet
Replica East Empire Pendant
Ash Spawn Weapons
And
descriptionHtml:
DragonBorn Craftables and Temperables 

3.4 Adds 54 Items to the Game Craft Menu From DragonBorn

Allows you to make and upgrade the following, all unenchanted.

 Telvani Robes (For Mages No Rating)
 Telvani Shoes (For Mages No Rating)
 Leather Telvani Robes (Light armor)
 Temple Priest Robes (For Mages No Rating)
 Leather Temple Priest Robes (Light armor)
 Leather Plate Cultist Robes, Gloves, Boots, Mask (Light armor)
 Cultist Robes (Light armor)
 Carius\' Armor (Heavy Armor)
 Heart Stone Necklace (At this this is nothing special)
 Falx Armor, Glove, Boots, Helmet (Heavy Armor)
 Replica East Empire Pendant
 Ash Spawn Battleaxe
 Ash Spawn War axe
 Giant Fishman Weapon
 Riekling Spear
 Riekling Spear Charge
 Champion\'s Cudgel
 Broken Ancient Nordic Pickaxe
 Skaal Robes, Boots, Gloves, Hat (Light armor)
 Replica Miraak Mask (Must Use Masks Dropped off Cultist) (Heavy Armor)
 Replica Miraak Robes (Heavy Armor)
 Replica Miraak Gloves (Heavy Armor)
 Replica Miraak Boots (Heavy Armor)
 Added Miraak Staff (Made a weaker Enchanted Version)
 Added Dunmer (Clothes Blue and red Hooded and No Hood)
 Bloodskal Sword added
 Replica Miraak Mask (Must Use Masks Dropped off Cultist) (Light Armor)
 Replica Miraak Robes (Light Armor)
 Replica Miraak Gloves (Light Armor)
 Replica Miraak Boots (Light Armor)
 Replica Miraak Sword (A little stronger then daedric).
 Heavy Skaal gear gloves, boots, chest, hat (Heavy Armor)
 Replica Ahzidal Mask (Heavy Armor)
 Replica Dukaan Mask (Heavy Armor)
 Replica Zahkriisos Mask (Heavy Armor)
 Replica Ahzidal Mask (Light Armor)
 Replica Dukaan Mask (Light Armor)
 Replica Zahkriisos Mask (Light Armor)
 Heavy Stalhrim Shield (Reqires the same as other Stalhrim Gear)
 Broken Ahzidal\'s Boots of Waterwalking (Too Disenchant not tested so let me know if they do not work) 
 Broken Bloodskal Blade (Too Disenchant not tested so let me know if they do not work)
 Hrothmund\'s Axe (Two Handed)

This is the first release I haven\'t played all of dragonborn yet so if their is something you would like added from dragonborn let me know. I will add it. Same goes for changes let me know if something is unbalanced. 


Future plans add more if needed, Change if needed, and Add request (That are not game breaking).  Add something special for the Bloodstone Necklace. Keep the comments coming; I will get it all sorted out.




[color=yellow][u][b]My other mods[/b][/u][/color]
[color=yellow][u][b]Draco1122[/b][/u][/color]
